text: Rachel Vail (born July 25, 1966), is an American author of children's and young adult books. == Life == She was born in Manhattan, grew up in New Rochelle, New York, and is a graduate of Georgetown University. Her debut novel Wonder won an Editor's Choice award from Booklist in 1991, and in 1992 her second novel, Do-Over, won that award also. ==Bibliography== ===Young adult novels=== *Wonder (1991) *Do-Over
